original_text: “Get away from the midst of this congregation, that I may consume them in a moment.” And they fell on their faces.
korean_text: 너희는 이 회중에게서 떠나라 내가 순식간에 그들을 멸하려 하노라 하시매 그 두 사람이 엎드리니라

sentences.original_text: Get away from the midst of this congregation
that I may consume them in a moment
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 순식간에 그들을 삼키게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: And they fell on their faces
